title: BorisBritva2018
author: BorisBritva2018
content: Hello, looking to buy some mining equipment. Is this https://bitmars.io/ safe place to buy? Anyone have experience with this site?

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: I don't have any experience with that site, but my little digging around bring me to a conclusion that it's not a site or mining equipment reseller to trust.They are liars. Very dishonest. You can never trust a liar.1. Claim to have been in business since 2018 and selling 200K miners since 2021The domain name however is not more than 5 months old. That probably the time they bought itCode:Domain: bitmars.ioRegistrar: GoDaddy.com, LLCRegistered On: 2023-05-22Expires On: 2025-05-22Updated On: 2023-08-192. Someone already complaining about them on TwitterQuote from: https://twitter.com/Lawrence9652/status/1709394386021143015Be careful with this company. They are not honest. They do not honor their quotes.

comments.author: BorisBritva2018
comments.body: Thx a lot for your answer. What sites anyone can recomed where to buy mining equipment. I am located in Europe.
